categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: JJH2 was an astromech droid model of the same name who was active during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Colored in purple and black, JJH2 was a crew member of the Mighty Oak Apocalypse, a freighter owned by the Wookiee captain Lohgarra. After the MOA crew joined the Rebel Alliance, the droid was assigned to Corona Squadron, serving as a co-pilot of Corona Two during the Battle of Endor.
JJH2 first appeared in Lost Stars, a canon young adult novel written by Claudia Gray as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens series.
